effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Rising Sun Kick and Spinning Crane Kick by 3% stacking up to 10 times. Rising Sun Kick and Spinning Crane Kick have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: Fists of Fury applies 1 stack of  Winning Streak! when cast and when finished channeling completely. The damage of your next Fists of Fury is increased by 8% per stack when  Winning Streak! is removed.

Your  Winning Streak! is always removed once it reaches max stacks.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Mechano-Core Amplifier

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful abilities have a chance to power the amplifier, randomly increasing either your highest secondary stat by 3,340 or your lowest secondary stat by 4,214 for 10 sec.

description: Intended for machine use only. Use at your own risk.

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a chance to harmonize with the shard, granting you 15,260 Agility for 15 sec.

Equip: Gain a high chance to follow up your attacks with a fiery gilded uppercut, dealing 372,319 Fire damage to your target. Molten gold continues to splatter to deal 103,422 Fire damage over 5 sec to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 enemies.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,620 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
